channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Enable/Disable Auto Login when Register
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Enable/Disable Auto Login when Register

item.title: CVE-2023-0522|2024-08-02T05:17:49.238Z -- unknown -- enable%2Fdisable%20auto%20login%20when%20register
item.description: The Enable/Disable Auto Login when Register WordPress plugin through 1.1.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
